<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Extension point for the Value hierarchy. All classes outside of lib/IR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that wish to inherit from User should instead inherit from DerivedUser</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instead. Inheriting from this class is discouraged.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Generally speaking, Value is the base of a closed class hierarchy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that can&#39;t be extended by code outside of lib/IR. This class creates a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loophole that allows classes outside of lib/IR to extend User to leverage</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// its use/def list machinery.</span></CodeLine>
